title: Adobe ColdFusion - Access Control Bypass [CVE-2023-38205] at ██████
content:
Hello Gents, I would like to report an issue where attackers are able to bypass the product feature that restricts external access to the ColdFusion Administrator. [CVE-2023-38205] at ██████
Steps to reproduce
Please open the following link:
https://█████████/hax/..CFIDE/wizards/common/utils.cfc?method=wizardHash&inPassword=foo&_cfclient=true&returnFormat=wddx

vuln_description: This vulnerability allows attackers to bypass the access control restrictions that are supposed to limit external access to the ColdFusion Administrator. By crafting a specific URL, an attacker can interact with the ColdFusion Administrator utilities without proper authentication.
reason: The vulnerability involves a straightforward URL manipulation to bypass access controls. The attack does not require multiple components, complex state manipulation, or novel logic. The URL construction is simple and the interaction is direct.
